name: 11.7 "The Girl in the Plastic Bubble" Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did the mayor of Hanover run off with, which caused a scandal?
questions.explanation:
Old Mr. Smithers

	Frasier: "That's not very scandalous, Woody." "Well, Mr. Smithers was a goat." As usual you can never tell what kind of stories Woody is going to tell about Hanover.

questions.text: Who told Frasier there may have been signs that Lilith was having an affair that Frasier was too blind to see?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	One of the things he mentioned was the fact that for the last 6 months Lilith worked late every night. Frasier was not dealing well with Lilith leaving him at all, and the night before he passed out drunk and slept on the couch in Sam's office.

questions.text: Who did Carla compare to a caveman?
questions.explanation:
Nick Tortelli.

	Nick Tortelli was Carla's first husband. They fought like crazy but she still found him attractive. However, in an episode many seasons ago, she learned she could resist his charms so he couldn't hurt her again. Like Lilith, Nick was cheating on Carla while they were married.

questions.text: How did Cliff suggest Frasier get Lilith back?
questions.explanation:
Fake a heart attack.

	Cliff said no one would walk out on someone in that condition. He and his mother faked heart attacks on each other, depending on whose turn it was to leave.

No.

	She told Frasier she wanted a trial separation. She also told him she needed him to have sole custody of Frederick for a while.

questions.text: Where was Lilith going to live?
questions.explanation:
Ecopod.

	Fraiser couldn't believe his ears. Nothing Lilith was saying was making sense to him, in part because it was crazy and in part because she was leaving him. He said, "This is the stupidest day I've ever had."

questions.text: What is Lilith's nickname for Dr. Pascal?
questions.explanation:
Googie.

	She said he's a free thinker and when she's with him she never knows what she's going to do next. She told Frasier she liked that feeling and that's why she was leaving him.

questions.text: When Sam told Rebecca to say something positive to Frasier to cheer him up, what did she say?
questions.correct: Say Frasier, have you lost weight?
options: Cheer up Frasier, I'm sure Lilith will come back to you.
Frasier, it's okay Lilith was not that great anyway.
I'm here if you need  me, Frasier.
questions.explanation:
Say Frasier, have you lost weight?.

	Sam smacked her in the arm with a bar rag. Rebecca said to Sam, "What? That would cheer me up."

questions.text: How did Frasier deal with Lilith leaving?
questions.correct: By being several stories up on a ledge yelling, "I'm gonna jump Lilith!"
options: By running around the bar yelling "I'm gonna kill her!"
By being a man and accepting it.
By throwing himself down on the ground and having a tantrum.
questions.explanation:
By being several stories up on a ledge yelling, "I'm gonna jump Lilith!".

	Norm asked Frasier if he could have his beer. Carla told him he didn't have the guts to jump.

questions.text: Who got Frasier to come inside the window?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	She told him she won't play in emotional blackmail. Then he said, he really was going to jump. She agreed not to leave him even if she's unhappy the rest of her life. Frasier told her to leave because he couldn't be happy if she wasn't.
